prefdef.name: TABLEHEADCOLOR
prefdef.hints: Color of table header, for summary lists.

prefdef.name: TABLEROWCOLOR1
prefdef.hints: Color of even lines in summary lists.

prefdef.name: TABLEROWCOLOR2
prefdef.hints: Color of odd lines in summary lists.

prefdef.name: FOOTERFONTCOLOR
prefdef.hints: Color of copyright message and other normal text in the status bar.

prefdef.name: MENUHEADCOLOR
prefdef.hints: Color of the title box in menus.

prefdef.name: HEADERBACK
prefdef.hints: Used as background for header center. Must match left and right images, same height but just 1 or 2 pixels wide; image is stretched between left and right.

prefdef.name: FOOTERBACK
prefdef.hints: Used as background for footer center. Must match left and right images, same height but just 1 or 2 pixels wide; image is stretched between left and right.

prefdef.name: EMAILFOOTER
prefdef.hints: Text added to all emails sent from application
prefdef.default: You can connect to the application on: $(url). Please do not reply to this email.

prefdef.name: STYLESHEET
prefdef.hints: See header.asp for details and allowed style classes. To edit the stylesheet, choose 'View Source', and copy the HTML source code into your editor. Make your changes to the stylesheet and when satisfied, copy the stylesheet text back into this screen.
